00084 void X_InitClassReference(JNIEnv *env, jclass *classReference,
00085                 const char *className) {
00086         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00087         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(className, "className");
00088         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(classReference, "classReference");
00089         jclass klaz = env->FindClass(className);
00090         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(klaz, "klaz");
00091         *classReference = static_cast<jclass>(env->NewGlobalRef((jobject) klaz));
00092         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(*classReference, "*classReference");
00093 }
00094 
00095 void X_FreeClassReference(JNIEnv *env, jclass* globalRef){
00096         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00097         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(globalRef, "globalRef");
00098         env->DeleteGlobalRef(*globalRef);
00099         *globalRef = NULL;
00100 }

00102 // use native bool parameter
00103 jobject X_NewBoolean(JNIEnv *env, bool value) {
00104         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00105         return env->NewObject(jdk_clsBoolean, jdk_clsBoolean_initID, BOOLEAN(value));
00106 }

00110         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00111         return env->NewObject(jdk_clsInteger, jdk_clsInteger_initID, (jint) value);
00112 }

00120 // NOTE: ipv4 only
00121 int X_InitSockAddr(sockaddr* sockAddr) {
00122         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(sockAddr, "sockAddr");
00123         sockaddr_in* sockAddrIn = (sockaddr_in*) sockAddr;
00124         sockAddrIn->sin_family = AF_INET;
00125         memset(&(sockAddrIn->sin_zero), '\0', 8);
00126         return JNI_OK;
00127 }
00128 
00129 // NOTE: ipv4 only
00130 int X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr(JNIEnv* env,
00131                 jobject objInetSocketAddress, sockaddr* sockAddr) {
00132 
00133         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(env, "env");
00134         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(sockAddr, "sockAddr");
00135         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(objInetSocketAddress, "objInetSocketAddress");
00136 
00137         jobject objInetAddress = env->GetObjectField(objInetSocketAddress,
00138                         isa_InetAddressID);
00139         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(objInetAddress, "objInetAddress");
00140 
00141         jint address = env->GetIntField(objInetAddress, ia_AddressID);
00142         jint port = env->GetIntField(objInetSocketAddress, isa_PortID);
00143 
00144         sockaddr_in* sockAddrIn = (sockaddr_in*) sockAddr;
00145 
00146         sockAddrIn->sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(address);
00147         sockAddrIn->sin_port = htons(port); // msvc C4244
00148 
00149         return JNI_OK;
00150 
00151 }

00153 // NOTE: ipv4 only
00154 int X_ConvertSockaddrToInetSocketAddress(JNIEnv* env, sockaddr* sockAddr,
00155                 jobject objInetSocketAddress) {
00156 
00157         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(env, "env");
00158         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(sockAddr, "sockAddr");
00159         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(objInetSocketAddress, "objInetSocketAddress");
00160 
00161         jobject objInetAddress = env->GetObjectField(objInetSocketAddress,
00162                         isa_InetAddressID);
00163         CHK_NUL_RET_ERR(objInetAddress, "objInetAddress");
00164 
00165         sockaddr_in* sockAddrIn = (sockaddr_in*) sockAddr;
00166 
00167         jint address = ntohl(sockAddrIn->sin_addr.s_addr);
00168         jint port = ntohs(sockAddrIn->sin_port);
00169 
00170         env->SetIntField(objInetAddress, ia_AddressID, address);
00171         env->SetIntField(objInetSocketAddress, isa_PortID, port);
00172 
00173         return JNI_OK;
00174 
00175 }

00178 jobject X_NewInetAddress(JNIEnv* env, jint address) {
00179 
00180         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00181         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(jdk_clsInet4Address, "jdk_clsInet4Address");
00182 
00183         jobject objInetAddress = env->NewObject(jdk_clsInet4Address,
00184                         jdk_clsInet4Address_initID);
00185 
00186         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objInetAddress, "objInetAddress");
00187 
00188         env->SetIntField(objInetAddress, ia_AddressID, address);
00189

00194 // NOTE: ipv4 only
00195 jobject X_NewInetSocketAddress(JNIEnv* env, sockaddr* sockAddr) {
00196 
00197         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00198         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(sockAddr, "sockAddr");
00199 
00200         sockaddr_in* sockAddrIn = (sockaddr_in*) sockAddr;
00201         jint address = ntohl(sockAddrIn->sin_addr.s_addr);
00202         jint port = ntohs(sockAddrIn->sin_port);
00203 
00204         jobject objInetAddress = X_NewInetAddress(env, address);
00205         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objInetAddress, "objInetAddress");
00206 
00207         jobject objInetSocketAddress = env->NewObject(jdk_clsInetSocketAddress,
00208                         jdk_clsInetSocketAddress_initID, objInetAddress, port);
00209 
00210         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objInetSocketAddress, "objInetSocketAddress");
00211 
00212         return objInetSocketAddress;
00213 
00214 }

00216 bool X_IsSockaddrEqualsInetSocketAddress(JNIEnv* env, sockaddr* sockAddr,
00217                 jobject socketAddress) {
00218 
00219         CHK_NUL_RET_FLS(env, "env");
00220         CHK_NUL_RET_FLS(sockAddr, "sockAddr");
00221         CHK_NUL_RET_FLS(socketAddress, "socketAddress");
00222 
00223         sockaddr_in* sockAddrIn = (sockaddr_in*) sockAddr;
00224 
00225         jint address1 = ntohl(sockAddrIn->sin_addr.s_addr);
00226         jint port1 = ntohs(sockAddrIn->sin_port);
00227 
00228         jobject objInetAddress = env->GetObjectField(socketAddress,
00229                         isa_InetAddressID);
00230 
00231         CHK_NUL_RET_FLS(objInetAddress, "objInetAddress");
00232 
00233         jint address2 = env->GetIntField(objInetAddress, ia_AddressID);
00234         jint port2 = env->GetIntField(socketAddress, isa_PortID);
00235 
00236         if (address1 == address2 && port1 == port2) {
00237                 return true;
00238         }
00239 
00240         return false;
00241 
00242 }
